title: "Voicing" Every Key/Screen Touched -- EXASPERATING!!!
content: Two days following updating my Pixel 2a to Android 11, I was attempting to screen capture using the power button. When that didn't work any longer, I pressed the Vol keys randomly.  Now the phone is "TALKING" all the time stating every key or screen buttom pressed.  I MUST GET THIS TURNED OFF but do not know how or even what this mode is call or why it exists!  Help please.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
